backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing a calculator with add, subtract, multiply, and divide operations, storing up to 10 recent calculation history entries with timestamps and supporting retrieval and clearing of history.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report confirming that the CalculatorKeypad component was updated to have exactly one '=' button positioned at the bottom of the right column.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence summaries of each frontend source file, describing their roles in the Study Calculator app's styling, components, and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH CSS custom properties for light and dark themes covering background, foreground, card, border, and chart colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that sets the page title to 'Study Calculator' and mounts the React app via the root div and main.tsx module script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component rendering the full app layout with a dark header (brand, on-chain indicator, HamburgerMenu), the Calculator component in the main area, and a footer with a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/Calculator.tsx: Main calculator orchestrator managing expression parsing, operator handling, keyboard input, and auto-preview logic, composing CalculatorDisplay, CalculatorKeypad, and CalculatorHistory with backend mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/CalculatorDispla: Display component rendering the current expression and result with distinct styles for error, loading, confirmed, and auto-preview states using neon-green OKLCH colors and a scanline overlay effect.
frontend/src/components/CalculatorHistor: Renders a scrollable calculator history panel with timestamps, showing past calculations and a confirmation dialog to clear all history using the `useClearHistory` mutation.
frontend/src/components/CalculatorKeypad: Defines the calculator keypad layout (digits, operators, scientific functions) and renders styled buttons with hover effects, invoking an `onButton` callback on press.
frontend/src/components/HamburgerMenu.ts: A hamburger menu button that toggles a slide-in dropdown panel with Calculator, History, and About navigation items, closing on outside click or Escape key.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) via React Query, invalidating dependent queries whenever the actor or identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an `InternetIdentityProvider` and `useInternetIdentity` hook that manage DFINITY AuthClient login/logout state, persisting identity across page reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for calculator operations (add, subtract, multiply, divide, history fetch, clear history), with local fallback computation and localStorage-based timestamp caching for history entries.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports JetBrains Mono and Inter fonts, sets up Tailwind directives, and defines OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for the dark theme including calculator-specific design tokens and utility classes for neon glow effects and button press animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that mounts the app with QueryClientProvider for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication wrapping the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with Inter/JetBrains Mono fonts, OKLCH-based semantic color tokens (including calculator-specific calc-* colors), and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata file tracking version 3 of the calculator app, describing a fix request to remove duplicate '=' buttons from the keypad layout so only one '=' button exists at the bottom of the right column.
